Position: Technical Project Manager
Company: Tech Corporation
Location: Tokyo, Japan

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Technical Project Manager to lead our cross-functional engineering team. This role requires strong Japanese language skills for effective communication with local stakeholders and clients.

Responsibilities:
- Lead cross-functional teams to deliver software projects on time and within budget
- Coordinate with Japanese stakeholders to gather requirements and provide updates
- Manage project risks and dependencies
- Facilitate communication between technical and non-technical teams

Requirements:
- 5+ years of project management experience in technology companies
- Native or fluent Japanese language skills required
- Experience with agile methodologies and Scrum
- Strong technical background in software development
- Experience managing remote and distributed teams

Nice-to-have:
- PMP certification
- Experience in enterprise software development
- Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
